name: galactic-wallet
description: Galactic smart wallet for Sui blockchain
author: Brandon Arbuthnot

scripts.build: npm run build:minimal && npm run build:zklogin && npm run inject
scripts.build:full: npm run build:minimal && npm run build:zklogin && npm run build:circuit && npm run inject
scripts.build:minimal: BUILD_TARGET=minimal vite build && mv dist-temp-minimal/sui-sdk-minimal.iife.js dist/ && rm -rf dist-temp-minimal
scripts.build:zklogin: BUILD_TARGET=zklogin vite build && mv dist-temp-zklogin/zklogin-helpers.iife.js dist/ && rm -rf dist-temp-zklogin
scripts.build:circuit: npm run circuit:compile && npm run circuit:setup
scripts.circuit:setup: cd circuits && snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 13 build/pot13_0000.ptau -v && echo 'galactic-zklogin-entropy-$(date +%s)' | snarkjs powersoftau contribute build/pot13_0000.ptau build/pot13_0001.ptau --name='Galactic zkLogin' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot13_0001.ptau build/pot13_final.ptau -v && snarkjs groth16 setup zklogin.r1cs build/pot13_final.ptau build/zklogin_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/zklogin_0000.zkey build/verification_key.json && cp build/zklogin_js/zklogin.wasm ../public/ && cp build/zklogin_0000.zkey ../public/zklogin.zkey && cp build/verification_key.json ../public/
scripts.mini-build: npm run build:minimal && npm run build:zklogin && npm run inject
